  • Method Details

    • selectThoCardsToKeep

      public void selectThoCardsToKeep​(int card1, int card2) throws ActionNotAllowedException, PositionInvalidException, GameEndedException
      This method let, at the beginning to choose two of the four leader card that you draw at the beginning
      Parameters:
      card1 - the first card you choose
      card2 - the second card you choose
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this moment
      PositionInvalidException - if you choose an invalid position
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points

      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this moment
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished

      public void chooseDiscardLeaderCard() throws NoLeaderCardToDiscardException, ActionNotAllowedException

      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this moment
      NoLeaderCardToDiscardException - if there isn't any LeaderCard in the hand

      This method advances the turn if the player choose to play a leader card
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this moment
      NoLeaderCardToPlayException - if there isn't any LeaderCard in the hand that can be placed

    • discardLeaderCard

      public void discardLeaderCard​(int pos) throws AlreadyDiscardedThisLeaderCardException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException, PositionInvalidException
      This method lets the player discard one leader card from his hand
      Parameters:
      pos - : position of the leader card in the hand
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this moment
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished
      PositionInvalidException - if the position isn't 1 or 2
      AlreadyDiscardedThisLeaderCardException - if you try to discard a card from an empty position

      public void playLeaderCard​(int pos) throws NotSatisfiedRequirementsForThisLeaderCardException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException, PositionInvalidException

      Parameters:
      pos - : position of the leader card in the hand
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this moment
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished
      PositionInvalidException - if the position isn't 1 or 2
      NotSatisfiedRequirementsForThisLeaderCardException - if the requirements to play the card aren't met

    • takeResourcesFromTheMarket

      public void takeResourcesFromTheMarket​(RowColumn rowColumn, int pos) throws ActionNotAllowedException, PositionInvalidException, NullEnumException, NoWhiteMarbleLeaderCardException
      This method lets the player take resources from the market
      Parameters:
      rowColumn - : indicates a row or a column
      pos - : indicates the number of the row or column
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this moment
      PositionInvalidException - if the selected row or column is invalid
      NullEnumException - if there is a null pointer instead of a row or column
      NoWhiteMarbleLeaderCardException - if an unexpectedly it fails to obtain the WhiteMarbleLeaderCard

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(LeaderWarehouse where, int pos) throws NoResourceToAddException, DifferentStorageException, OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException, PositionAlreadyOccupiedException, ResourceAlreadyPlacedException, DifferentResourceInThisShelfException, UnexpectedWhiteMarbleException, UnexpectedFaithMarbleException, ActionNotAllowedException, IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException
      This method lets the player deposit or discard a resource
      Parameters:
      where - : indicates a warehouse, a leader card or to discard
      pos - : indicates the number of the slot in the storage
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this moment
      NoResourceToAddException - if all the marbles are been placed
      DifferentStorageException - if you select an ExtraStorageLeaderCard of a wrong type
      OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException - if you select an ExtraStorageLeaderCard slot already occupied
      PositionAlreadyOccupiedException - if you select a WarehouseDepots slot already occupied
      ResourceAlreadyPlacedException - if you place in the WarehouseDepots a resource already present on another shelf
      DifferentResourceInThisShelfException - if you place in the WarehouseDepots a different resource from the one already present in the shelf
      UnexpectedWhiteMarbleException - if there is an unexpected white marble
      UnexpectedFaithMarbleException - if there is an unexpected faith marble
      IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException - if you are out of bounds of the WarehouseDepots

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(LeaderWarehouse where) throws NoResourceToAddException, DifferentStorageException, OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException, PositionAlreadyOccupiedException, ResourceAlreadyPlacedException, DifferentResourceInThisShelfException, UnexpectedWhiteMarbleException, UnexpectedFaithMarbleException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method adds resources for the current player
      Parameters:
      where - position
      Throws:
      NoResourceToAddException - no resources to add
      DifferentStorageException - different storage type
      OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException - occupied slot
      PositionAlreadyOccupiedException - if the position isn't 1 or 2
      ResourceAlreadyPlacedException - resource already placed
      DifferentResourceInThisShelfException - different resource already placed here
      UnexpectedWhiteMarbleException - unexpected white marble
      UnexpectedFaithMarbleException - unexpected faith marble
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this momentn

    • changeWhiteMarbleWith

      public void changeWhiteMarbleWith​(int pos) throws NoWhiteMarbleLeaderCardException, NoWhiteMarbleException, ActionNotAllowedException, PositionInvalidException
      This method lets the player change a white marble with another resource
      Parameters:
      pos - : the position of a WhiteMarbleLeaderCard on the table
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if this action isn't allowed in this moment
      NoWhiteMarbleLeaderCardException - if in the selected position there's not a WhiteMarbleLeaderCard
      NoWhiteMarbleException - if the current marble is not white
      PositionInvalidException - if the position isn't 1 or 2

    • buyADevelopmentCard

      public void buyADevelopmentCard​(int xx, int yy) throws ActionNotAllowedException, SelectedADevelopmentCardYetException, NotAbleToBuyThisDevelopmentCardException, DrawnFromEmptyDeckException, PositionInvalidException, NotAbleToPlaceThisDevelopmentCardException, IndexOutOfDevelopmentDeckException
      This method lets you buy a development card by checking first the resources you have, then looking for the cards on table and then checking if you have enough resources to buy.
      Parameters:
      xx - rows from 1 to 4
      yy - columns from 1 to 3
      Throws:
      PositionInvalidException - if rows coordinate is lower than 1 and column coordination is greater than 3
      NotAbleToBuyThisDevelopmentCardException - when you don't have enough resources to buy a development card
      NotAbleToPlaceThisDevelopmentCardException - when you dont have space in your storage after buying it
      DrawnFromEmptyDeckException - if the deck selected is empty
      SelectedADevelopmentCardYetException - if you have yet selected a DevelopmentCard
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you've bought a DevelopmentCard yet
      IndexOutOfDevelopmentDeckException - if you are out of bound of DevelopmentDeck

    • placeDevelopmentCard

      public void placeDevelopmentCard​(int pos) throws NoDevelopmentCardToObtainException, PositionInvalidException, GameEndedException, ActionNotAllowedException, IndexOutOfSlotDevelopmentCardsException
      This method lets you to take a Development card First choose the development card and than pay for it.
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the DevelopmentCard on SlotDevelopmentCard
      Throws:
      NoDevelopmentCardToObtainException - if the place you chose has no development card,
      PositionInvalidException - if the position you chose does not exists
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      ActionNotAllowedException - if action is different from BUY_DEVELOPMENT_CARD
      IndexOutOfSlotDevelopmentCardsException - if you are out of bound of slots for development cards

    • payWithStrongBox

      public void payWithStrongBox​(Resource pay) throws WrongPaymentException, NegativeResourceException, NotAResourceForStrongBoxException, NoResourceToPayException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method let to pay a resource from the list payingResources using the StrongBox, but before checking if you are in the right states
      Parameters:
      pay - : to choose the type of resource from the Strongbox you are using to pay
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      WrongPaymentException - if you are using a different type of resource from the resource requested
      NegativeResourceException - if you are going to pay with a resource ypu dont have in the Strongbox
      NotAResourceForStrongBoxException - if the resource passed is not supposed to be stored in the strong box
      NoResourceToPayException - if you haven't anything to pay

    • payWithWarehouseDepots

      public void payWithWarehouseDepots​(int pos) throws WrongPaymentException, EmptySlotYetException, NoResourceToPayException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method lets you pay a resource with a resource located in the warehousedepots. When action is chosen it cheks if resource are of the same type or not.It checks if the player is in the right turn to pay with the resources in the ware house depots.
      Parameters:
      pos - :Location of the resource to pay from warehousedepots
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      NoResourceToPayException - if you haven't anything to pay
      WrongPaymentException - if the resources to pay are different
      EmptySlotYetException - if the selected slot is empty

    • payWithExtraStorageLeaderCard

      public void payWithExtraStorageLeaderCard​(int pos) throws NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException, WrongPaymentException, EmptySlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException, NoResourceToPayException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException, PositionInvalidException
      This method lets you pay with a Leader Card positioned in your table, by checking firstly if you any resources, secondly if the position player chose really exists, thirdly if card chosen is really a leader card, and the last if the cards are the same type. Always controlling first if the player is in the right turn to do che paying process.
      Parameters:
      pos - : position from 1 to 2 to chose on your table
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException - if card chosen is not an Extra Strorage Leader Card
      WrongPaymentException - if cards choese are not the same type of extra storage leader card
      NoResourceToPayException - if you don't have any resources left.
      PositionInvalidException - if the position is lower than 1 e greater than 2
      EmptySlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException - if the operation of removing a resource from an ExtraStorageLeaderCard fails

    • selectProductionDevelopmentCard

      public void selectProductionDevelopmentCard​(int pos) throws ActionNotAllowedException, PositionInvalidException, NoDevelopmentCardInThisPositionException
      This method let you select or deselect a production power from a DevelopmentCard and by checking the turns of the player if he is allwed to do this method or not
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the DevelopmentCard
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states
      PositionInvalidException - if the position isn't 1, 2 or 3
      NoDevelopmentCardInThisPositionException - if there is no DevelopmentCard in the selected position

    • selectProductionPowerLeaderCard

      public void selectProductionPowerLeaderCard​(int pos) throws NoProductionLeaderCardException, ActionNotAllowedException, PositionInvalidException

      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the ProductionPowerLeaderCard
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states

    • obtainGenericResource

      public void obtainGenericResource​(Resource resource) throws NoGenericResourceToObtainException, NotAResourceForStrongBoxException, GameEndedException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method lets you to choose a specific power production at your choice
      Parameters:
      resource - it takes a resource ball with a generic power
      Throws:
      NoGenericResourceToObtainException - there ane not any generic resource to obtain
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      NotAResourceForStrongBoxException - if the resource in input isn't nor COIN, STONE, SERVANT or SHIELD
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states

    • startPayment

      public void startPayment() throws NotEnoughResourcesException, YouHaveNotSelectedAnyProductionException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method let you start the payment of the selected production power
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResourcesException - if you aren't able to pay all production power
      YouHaveNotSelectedAnyProductionException - if you haven't selected any production power
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points

    • selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot

      public void selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot​(int pos) throws PositionInvalidException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let player to select a slot of the WarehouseDepots useful for moveResourcesInWarehouseDepots, moveResourcesFromWarehouseDepotsToExtraStorageLeaderCard and moveResourcesToWarehouseDepotsFromExtraStorageLeaderCard the selected slot is saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the slot of the WarehouseDepots
      Throws:
      PositionInvalidException - if the selected position is invalid
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states

    • moveResourcesInWarehouseDepots

      public void moveResourcesInWarehouseDepots​(int pos2) throws NotAdmittedMovementException, IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let player to move up to two resources in the WarehouseDepots the first position was selected using selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot and saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
      Parameters:
      pos2 - : to choose the second position of the slot of the WarehouseDepots
      Throws:
      NotAdmittedMovementException - if the movement is invalid
      IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException - if you are out of bounds of the WarehouseDepots
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states

    • moveResourcesFromWarehouseDepotsToExtraStorageLeaderCard

      public void moveResourcesFromWarehouseDepotsToExtraStorageLeaderCard​(int pos) throws PositionInvalidException, NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException, EmptySlotYetException, OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException, DifferentStorageException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let player to move a resource from the warehouseDepots to an ExtraStorageLeaderCard the first position of the start slot of the warehouseDepots was selected using selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot and saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the number 1 or 2 to determinate the position of the ExtraStorageLeaderCard as destination
      Throws:
      PositionInvalidException - if the position of the ExtraStorageLeaderCard isn't 1 or 2
      NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException - if the selected LeaderCard isn't an ExtraStorageLeaderCard
      EmptySlotYetException - if the slot of the warehouseDepots was yet empty
      OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException - if all slot of the ExtraStorageLeaderCard are yet occupied
      DifferentStorageException - if the selected resource from warehouseDepots doesn't fit with the admitted resource of the selected ExtraStorageLeaderCard
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states

    • moveResourcesToWarehouseDepotsFromExtraStorageLeaderCard

      public void moveResourcesToWarehouseDepotsFromExtraStorageLeaderCard​(int pos) throws PositionInvalidException, NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException, PositionAlreadyOccupiedException, ResourceAlreadyPlacedException, DifferentResourceInThisShelfException, EmptySlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException, IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let player to move a resource from an ExtraStorageLeaderCard to the selected slot of the warehouseDepots the arrive position of the slot of the warehouseDepots was selected using selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot and saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the number 1 or 2 to determinate the position of the ExtraStorageLeaderCard as start
      Throws:
      PositionInvalidException - if the position of the ExtraStorageLeaderCard isn't 1 or 2
      NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException - if the selected LeaderCard isn't an ExtraStorageLeaderCard
      PositionAlreadyOccupiedException - if the slot of the warehouseDepots was yet occupied
      ResourceAlreadyPlacedException - if the resource passed to the warehouseDepots is yet present on a different shelf
      DifferentResourceInThisShelfException - if there are different resources types already placed in the chosen shelf
      EmptySlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException - if the selected ExtraStorageLeaderCard is yet empty
      IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException - if you are out of bounds of the WarehouseDepots
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states

    • endTurnCommand

      public void endTurnCommand() throws ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method sets the command of ending the turn of a player
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - action not allowed if you in another state of the turn
      GameEndedException - game ended exception

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn() throws GameEndedException
      This method signalize end of a player turn, by ending an action leader and restarting to a new chose action leader. At the end of the methods it checks por the next player
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Getter of the parameter currentPlayer
      Returns:
      the current player
